General.Name: Vox Royalty Corp. Common Stock
General.Description: Vox Royalty Corp. operates as a mining royalty and streaming company. The company holds a portfolio of 62 royalties and streaming assets, as well as 2 royalty options. It operates in Australia, Canada, Peru, Brazil, South Africa, Mexico, the United States, Madagascar, the Cayman Islands, and Nigeria. Vox Royalty Corp. was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 66 Wellington Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1E6
